effect.name: Motion Blur (Whole frame only)
effect.description:
Creates motion blur effect if applied to the whole frame.
Notes: I don't think this works on Android, iOS and Mac yet because it has to be applied to the frame...
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Coefficient
parameter.description: Strength of the blur. The less, the stronger. 1 = None. Too little values leave artefacts.
